subject: Hockey, Ice
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Kyle Turris held out and requested a trade from the Coyotes in 2011. On the beaten-up Senators, he has been pushed into a role he has craved.
snippet: Kyle Turris held out and requested a trade from the Coyotes in 2011. On the beaten-up Senators, he has been pushed into a role he has craved.
